title: NECA God of War (2018) 7" Scale Action Figure
feature: Based on Sony's 2018 video game God of War
Kratos stands about 7 inches tall with 36 points of articulation
Accessories included: leviathan ave; dagger; shield
description: From Sony's upcoming God of war video game! after a decade of bestselling God of war games, it is a new beginning for Kratos. His vengeance against the gods of Olympus far behind him, Kratos now lives as a Man in the lands of Norse gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive - and teach his son to do the same. This 7" scale action figure features 36 points of articulation an incredibly detailed sculpt. Kratos comes with Leviathan axe, dagger and shield accessories. Window box packaging.
